value:
Father... Mother...
I'll do all I can to bring this
fighting to an end.

My father means everything to me.
If anyone tries to harm him, then
I would have no choice but to...

You deserve some rest. Is there
a task you'd like me to take care
of for you? Any errands to run?

This lance Geirskögul comes from
another world. It's not something...
I would normally have access to.

I'm sorry, but...I accidentally
destroyed another training
dummy. Lances are still new to me.

Your friend asked me to deliver a
greeting. You must cherish your bond
with $Nf.
To protect my father!

I think I'm starting to get the hang
of Ylissean lance techniques.

Perhaps the trick is to tighten
my grip on the lance...

Thank you so much.
I will not waste this power.

I am Lucina of Ylisse. With Geirskögul
in hand, I pledge my strength to you!

I learned all my sword techniques
from my father. He started training
me when I was still very young.$k$pThough at that age, our "training"
may have been more like playing.
Those are precious memories...$k$pBut despite all our time together,
he never got the chance to teach
me how to use a lance.$k$pThis world has an odd effect on me...
It has renewed my sense of hope.$k$pIt offers the chance to reunite with
the people I've lost. Those most
important to me...$k$pI'm no stranger to traveling between
worlds, so you can rest assured
I will not waste this opportunity.
せいっ！
いきます！
きゃああっ！
こんなことって…
For my father!
My path is clear!
With this lance!
Guide my hand!
Father...I'm sorry...
Heehee
Maybe it's a bit silly, but...I feel a little closer to my father now.
My father taught me the sword. I hope he'll teach me all about the lance as well.
Was there some kind of...contest in your world?
I dreamt that heroes from another world brought hope to a dark future.
This weapon was entrusted to me by people from another world. I'm certain of it.
Father... I hope I can fight by your side in this world, too.
Our bond... gives me strength!
Understood.
What's next?
Your orders?
